detectCmp.exists: body > div[class][data-location] > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > button:nth-child(2)

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div[class][data-location] > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > button:nth-child(2)
